[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” _builder_version=”3.29.3″ background_image=”https://switchmsp.co.nz/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/msp.jpg” background_position=”center_left” custom_padding=”155px||155px||true|” custom_padding_tablet=”120px||120px||true|false” custom_padding_phone=”50px||50px||true|false” background_last_edited=”on|phone” background_position_tablet=”center” fb_built=”1″ _i=”0″ _address=”0″][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.29.3″ _i=”0″ _address=”0.0″][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″ _i=”0″ _address=”0.0.0″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.29.3″ text_text_color=”#ffffff” header_font=”|800|||||||” header_font_size=”54px” background_layout=”dark” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”top” animation_duration=”1400ms” animation_intensity_slide=”8%” header_font_size_phone=”44px” header_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” text_text_shadow_style=”preset3″ header_text_shadow_style=”preset3″ _i=”0″ _address=”0.0.0.0″]

beyond technology

At Switch MSP We Mitigate Business Risks Through Managed IT Services

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url=”/it-support/” button_text=”contact us” _builder_version=”3.29.3″ custom_button=”on” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”bottom” animation_duration=”1450ms” animation_delay=”350ms” animation_intensity_slide=”9%” _i=”1″ _address=”0.0.0.1″ button_text_color__hover_enabled=”on|hover” button_text_color__hover=”#ffffff”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″ background_image=”https://switchmsp.co.nz/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/it-services.png” background_size=”contain” background_position=”bottom_right” background_last_edited=”on|phone” use_background_color_gradient_tablet=”on” background_color_gradient_start_tablet=”rgba(255,255,255,0.81)” background_color_gradient_end_tablet=”rgba(255,255,255,0.76)” background_color_gradient_overlays_image_tablet=”on” background_position_phone=”top_right” fb_built=”1″ _i=”1″ _address=”1″ custom_padding=”||9px|||”][et_pb_row column_structure=”3_5,2_5″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″ _i=”0″ _address=”1.0″][et_pb_column type=”3_5″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″ _i=”0″ _address=”1.0.0″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.29.3″ _i=”0″ _address=”1.0.0.0″]

Technology that’s aligned with your business

Reliability, performance, scalability, security and manageability: that’s what you’re looking for in your IT systems. And our tech support team knows how to make it happen. 

Managed IT services can reshape and then maintain your technology infrastructure so you can stay ahead of the game and run a leaner, more efficient business. 

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url=”/managed-services/” button_text=”FREE assessment” _builder_version=”3.29.3″ custom_button=”on” button_use_icon=”off” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”bottom” animation_duration=”1450ms” animation_delay=”350ms” animation_intensity_slide=”9%” _i=”1″ _address=”1.0.0.1″ button_text_color__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” button_text_color__hover=”#ffffff”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”2_5″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″ _i=”1″ _address=”1.0.1″][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.29.3″ _i=”1″ _address=”1.1″ custom_padding=”30px|||||”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″ _i=”0″ _address=”1.1.0″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.29.3″ width=”64%” width_tablet=”96%” width_last_edited=”on|tablet” module_alignment=”center” hover_enabled=”0″ _i=”0″ _address=”1.1.0.0″ background_color=”#ffffff” custom_padding=”10px|10px|10px|10px|true|false” border_radii=”on|16px|16px|16px|16px”]

We design, build, support and manage an IT system that will mitigate your business risks.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ next_background_color=”#ffffff” _builder_version=”3.29.3″ background_color=”#58585a” background_enable_image=”off” background_size=”contain” background_position=”top_right” custom_padding=”||22px|||” top_divider_flip=”vertical” bottom_divider_style=”ramp” bottom_divider_height=”100%” fb_built=”1″ _i=”2″ _address=”2″][et_pb_row column_structure=”2_5,3_5″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″ _i=”0″ _address=”2.0″][et_pb_column type=”2_5″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″ _i=”0″ _address=”2.0.0″][et_pb_image src=”https://switchmsp.co.nz/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/it-solutions-auckland.jpg” alt=”it solutions auckland” title_text=”it solutions auckland” _builder_version=”3.29.3″ border_radii=”on|500px|500px|500px|500px” border_width_all=”17px” border_color_all=”#ffffff” _i=”0″ _address=”2.0.0.0″][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”3_5″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″ _i=”1″ _address=”2.0.1″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.29.3″ text_text_color=”#c8c9ca” header_2_text_color=”#77b856″ custom_margin=”72px||||false|false” custom_margin_tablet=”10px||||false|false” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|phone” _i=”0″ _address=”2.0.1.0″]

Why Choose a Managed Service Provider (MSP)?

Get systems that can grow with your business and problems solved before they even happen. With our managed IT services your systems will be properly aligned with your business goals. We’ll build well-designed, properly documented network solutions that actually work for your business, provide end-to-end data protection and round-the-clock monitoring, give you access to files and applications on the go and help your staff become more computer savvy, confident and productive. 

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″ custom_padding=”8px||8px|||” fb_built=”1″ _i=”3″ _address=”3″][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.29.3″ custom_padding=”7px|||||” _i=”0″ _address=”3.0″][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″ _i=”0″ _address=”3.0.0″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.29.3″ header_font_size=”50px” _i=”0″ _address=”3.0.0.0″]

our services

Get IT solutions that let you get on with business.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url=”/managed-it-services/#services” button_text=”our service offerings” button_alignment=”center” _builder_version=”3.29.3″ custom_button=”on” button_use_icon=”off” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”bottom” animation_duration=”1450ms” animation_delay=”350ms” animation_intensity_slide=”9%” _i=”1″ _address=”3.0.0.1″ button_text_color__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” button_text_color__hover=”#ffffff”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,1_3,1_3″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″ width=”96%” width_last_edited=”on|tablet” _i=”1″ _address=”3.1″][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″ _i=”0″ _address=”3.1.0″][et_pb_blurb title=”Proactive Managed IT Services” image=”https://switchmsp.co.nz/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/it-outsourcing.png” alt=”it outsourcing” image_max_width=”40%” image_max_width_last_edited=”on|phone” _builder_version=”3.29.3″ header_font_size=”23px” text_orientation=”center” animation_style=”fade” animation_duration=”1400ms” link_option_url=”/managed-it-services/#services” transform_styles__hover_enabled=”on|hover” transform_scale__hover_enabled=”on|hover” transform_translate__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” transform_rotate__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” transform_skew__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” transform_origin__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” transform_scale__hover=”116%|116%” _i=”0″ _address=”3.1.0.0″]

Managed IT Solutions

You’ve got a business to run. You need to worry less about your business IT, so let us take it off your hands. We can give you peace of mind.

Our job as IT MSPs is to streamline operations, deliver more IT value to your business, keep you secure and innovative, provide comprehensive – and comprehensible – end-user support and make sure you have unlimited computer support 24/7. You’ll get all this from people who understand your business priorities as well as computers, wireless networks, servers, wires, cables and clouds without the expense and drama of building and maintaining an in-house IT department.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url=”/what-do-managed-service-providers-do/” button_text=”success stories” _builder_version=”3.29.3″ custom_button=”on” button_text_color=”#ffffff” button_border_color=”#ffffff” button_use_icon=”off” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”bottom” animation_duration=”1450ms” animation_delay=”350ms” animation_intensity_slide=”9%” _i=”1″ _address=”4.0.1.1″ button_text_color__hover_enabled=”on|hover” button_text_color__hover=”#58585a” button_border_color__hover_enabled=”on|hover” button_border_color__hover=”#58585a”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″ custom_padding=”29px||29px||true|” fb_built=”1″ _i=”5″ _address=”5″][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_4,3_4″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”4″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″ custom_padding=”||15px|||” _i=”0″ _address=”5.0″][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″ _i=”0″ _address=”5.0.0″][et_pb_code _builder_version=”3.29.3″ _i=”0″ _address=”5.0.0.0″][/et_pb_code][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”3_4″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″ _i=”1″ _address=”5.0.1″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.29.3″ text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”||5px|||” custom_padding=”39px|||90px|false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”0px||||false|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|tablet” _i=”0″ _address=”5.0.1.0″]

Call 0800-24-7-24-8 to find out more from the MSP team whose IT support is so good you’ll forget it’s even there.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″ background_color=”#58585a” background_image=”https://switchmsp.co.nz/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/it-services-for-business.png” background_size=”contain” background_position=”bottom_right” custom_padding=”31px||29px|||” global_module=”1667″ fb_built=”1″ _i=”7″ _address=”7″][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.29.3″ custom_padding=”6px|||||” _i=”0″ _address=”6.0″][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″ _i=”0″ _address=”6.0.0″][et_pb_image src=”https://switchmsp.co.nz/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/switch-msp-dark.jpg” alt=”Switch MSP” title_text=”Switch MSP” align=”center” align_tablet=”left” align_last_edited=”on|phone” _builder_version=”3.29.3″ max_width=”21%” max_width_tablet=”39%” max_width_phone=”48%” max_width_last_edited=”on|phone” custom_margin_tablet=”|||-24px|false|false” custom_margin_phone=”|||-15px|false|false” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|phone” _i=”0″ _address=”6.0.0.0″][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_4,1_4,1_4,1_4″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″ custom_padding=”6px||9px|||” _i=”1″ _address=”6.1″][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″ _i=”0″ _address=”6.1.0″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.29.3″ text_text_color=”#c8c9ca” header_4_text_color=”#c8c9ca” _i=”0″ _address=”6.1.0.0″]
